Description_lang: Delvar Ironfist is a surly dwarf that loves battle almost as much as mead.
AuraDescription_lang: Delvar Ironfist is a surly dwarf that loves battle almost as much as mead.

name_blz.zh_TW: 追隨者： 德爾瓦‧鐵拳

description_blz.en_US: Delvar Ironfist is a surly dwarf that loves battle almost as much as mead.
description_blz.es_MX: Delvar Puño de Hierro es un enano gruñón que ama el combate tanto como la hidromiel.
description_blz.pt_BR: Delvar Punho de Ferro é um anão ranheta que gosta de lutar tanto quanto gosta de hidromel.
description_blz.de_DE: Delvar Eisenfaust ist ein griesgrämiger Zwerg, der den Kampf ebenso sehr wie den Met liebt.
description_blz.en_GB: Delvar Ironfist is a surly dwarf that loves battle almost as much as mead.
description_blz.es_ES: Delvar Puño de Hierro es un enano hosco al que le encanta el combate casi tanto como el hidromiel.
description_blz.fr_FR: Delvar Poing-de-Fer est un Nain bourru qui aime presque autant le combat que l’hydromel.
description_blz.it_IT: Delvar Pugnoferreo è un robusto Nano che ama combattere in battaglia quasi quanto bere birra.
description_blz.ru_RU: Делвар Железный Кулак – угрюмый дворф, у которого два больших пристрастия: хорошая драка и крепкая медовуха.
description_blz.ko_KR: 델바 아이언피스트는 벌꿀술을 들이켜는 것만큼 전투를 좋아하는 괴팍한 드워프입니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 德爾瓦‧鐵拳是脾氣暴躁的矮人，永遠對戰鬥和蜂蜜酒樂此不疲。
description_blz.zh_CN: 德尔瓦·铁拳是个渴望战斗的矮人，就跟他渴望美酒一样。
